title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: The 'Close All Saved' functionality is not working consistently.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt, the user selects 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all open files should be closed and saved.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue with 'Close All Saved' functionality to ensure that it reliably closes and saves all open files.
